attributes.action: Provide driving instructors the power to pass learner drivers for practical test
attributes.additional_details: Review if it is suitable for an instructor to pass a learner driver and enforce limits similar to the current style for learner bike riders. Allowing a new driver to drive a vehicle of equivalent bhp or certain class, for a given number of years before full license approval. It will take pressure away from current services, allow those who want a 'full' power vehicles to proceed through current test procedures. E.g can drive normal roads but restricted to 50mph and cannot drive on motorways.
attributes.background: Parliament need to change the DVSA requirements during the current pandemic, which is not suitable, for many test ready learners they will be pushed back over 6 months with little to no lessons between due to regular tier 4 lockdowns and overwhelming demand on instructors.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549207
